ServiceResourcePreference.name: ServiceResourcePreference
ServiceResourcePreference.description: Represents the service resource scheduling preferences that are considered as a business objective in the scheduling logic engine.

EndDate.description: The end date period that this preference is effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the service resource preference was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the service resource preference was last viewed.

Name.description: The service resource preference record name.

OperatingHoursId.description: The operating hours associated with the service resource preference.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the service resource preference.

ServiceResourceId.description: The service resource associated with the service resource preference.

StartDate.description: The start date period that this preference is effective.
